message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good split.
I appreciate the offer, but I think a more even split is fair. How about 55-45?
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
Alice, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous. 52-48 is my final offer.
You said 52-48 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll give you 43%, that's my best offer for now.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome. I'm standing firm on this.
You're standing firm, I'm standing firmer. 56-44 is my new offer, take it or leave it.
